articles.title: FEEL GOOD | R6k tip for R453 bill! 'It's my birthday month, I’m going to spoil myself' - Cape waitress - News24
articles.description: Cape Town waitress Violet Musanandara was left "speechless" after the customer she had served on Friday night at Simply Asia in Durbanville left a R6 000 tip for her to split with her colleagues.
articles.content:
• The customer told her he did not make a mistake with the payment and that she should "split it amongst her 12 colleagues".
